name: Fracman
overview: Only few words for this masterpiece of the games revisited by Axel Software! It was inspired by 'RealPacman' of 'De Videorakkers&Peace', developed during spring/sumer of 2021 and ultimated on 2022. The early PC version was born in 1996, but it never was released; the old 2.0 Amiga version have too many bugs to see the light. Finally we got it, and... ... It Works! As usual eat all the pills and avoid the ghosts. Pick up the bows to get a good or bad gift.
